titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis and the Select Committee on the Modernization of Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis and the Select Committee on the Modernization of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 105, H. Res. 86 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis and the Select Committee on the Modernization of Congress. These amounts shall be made available beginning at noon on January 1, 2019, and ending on March 31, 2019.
